value: Chuck Norris once heard Vin Diesel was tougher than he was. Enraged Chuck began a cross country jog from Texas to California and confronted Vin. It is not known exactly what happened but Immeidately following the confrontation Vin appeared in the movie the "Pacifier", working for free. Vin has not appeared in any movies since but is scheduled to be a guest on the critically acclaimed sitcom "Days of our Lives".
